definition: the quality of being very good indeed
details:
noun
- the quality of being very good indeed
= example: the quality of being very good indeed
= synonyms: choiceness
- the quality of being beautiful and delicate in appearance
= synonyms: delicacy
- having a very fine texture
= example: having a very fine texture
= synonyms: powderiness
- the property of being very narrow or thin
= example: the property of being very narrow or thin
= synonyms: thinness
